body:
Select  GCM.CikanID, GCM.AddDate, P.ProsesAdi, S.UrunAdi, GCM.IsNo, SK.StokKodu
From    IT07_GerCikanMalzeme GCM
		Inner Join IT07_GerIsNo GI On GI.IsNo = GCM.IsNo
		Inner Join IT06_StokKarti SK On SK.UrunID = GCM.UrunID
		Inner Join IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SK.UrunTID
		Inner Join IT01_Prosesler P On P.ProsesID = GCM.ProsesID
Where   GCM.SeriID = $CURSOR$
